completeMysticalRule.short: MEQ-30 convention: a 'complete mystical experience' is typically defined as scoring ≥60% on each of the four subscales.

structure.short: MEQ-30 has four subscales: Mystical, Positive Mood, Transcendence of Time/Space, and Ineffability.

Barrett2015MEQ30.display: Barrett, Johnson, & Griffiths (2015) Validation of the revised Mystical Experience Questionnaire (MEQ30). Journal of Psychopharmacology.

Andersen2024MEQ30.display: Andersen et al. (2024/2025 online) Norwegian translation/adaptation of MEQ30. Journal of Psychedelic Studies.

complete: Your results meet the MEQ-30 research convention for a complete mystical-type experience: scores at or above 60% on each of the four subscales (Sense of Unity, Noetic Quality, and Sacredness; Positive Mood; Transcendence of Time/Space; and Ineffability).
notComplete: Your results do not meet the MEQ-30 research convention for a complete mystical-type experience (≥60% on each of the four subscales: Sense of Unity, Noetic Quality, and Sacredness; Positive Mood; Transcendence of Time/Space; and Ineffability). This does not mean your experience lacked meaning—only that it does not match the full MEQ-30 profile used for that specific classification.

profileSummary.template: Overall profile: {profileLabel}. Highest dimensions: {topFactors}. Lowest dimension: {bottomFactor}.

balanceLabels.uneven: selective—strong in some dimensions and muted in others

veryHigh: Your Sense of Unity, Noetic Quality, and Sacredness score is very high, suggesting strong qualities often described as unity, sacredness, and a felt sense of profound truth or insight within the experience.
high: Your Sense of Unity, Noetic Quality, and Sacredness score is high, indicating notable qualities of unity/sacredness and a sense that something deeply real or significant was encountered.
moderate: Your Sense of Unity, Noetic Quality, and Sacredness score is moderate, suggesting some meaningful mystical features were present, even if they were not dominant throughout the experience.
low: Your Sense of Unity, Noetic Quality, and Sacredness score is low, meaning the experience may have contained fewer of the classic “mystical core” features (e.g., unity/sacredness/noetic quality) as defined by the MEQ-30 framework.
minimal: Your Sense of Unity, Noetic Quality, and Sacredness score is minimal, indicating little endorsement of the core mystical features captured by the MEQ-30 Mystical dimension.

veryHigh: Your Positive Mood score is very high, reflecting strong feelings such as joy, peace, love, gratitude, or deep emotional uplift during the experience.
high: Your Positive Mood score is high, suggesting the experience included substantial emotional uplift and positive affect.
moderate: Your Positive Mood score is moderate, suggesting some positive emotional tone, though it may have been mixed, neutral, or variable.
low: Your Positive Mood score is low, suggesting the experience was not primarily characterized by positive affect—or may have been emotionally complex, neutral, or challenging.
minimal: Your Positive Mood score is minimal, indicating little endorsement of positive affect items in the MEQ-30 framework.

veryHigh: Your Transcendence of Time/Space score is very high, suggesting strong alteration of ordinary time, place, or personal perspective (e.g., timelessness, spacelessness, or a sense of being beyond usual boundaries).
high: Your Transcendence of Time/Space score is high, indicating notable shifts in how time and space were experienced.
moderate: Your Transcendence of Time/Space score is moderate, suggesting some departure from ordinary time/space perception, but not consistently or intensely.
low: Your Transcendence of Time/Space score is low, suggesting the experience stayed closer to ordinary perceptions of time and place.
minimal: Your Transcendence of Time/Space score is minimal, indicating little endorsement of time/space alteration items in the MEQ-30.

veryHigh: Your Ineffability score is very high, suggesting the experience felt especially difficult to capture in words—beyond ordinary language or description.
high: Your Ineffability score is high, indicating the experience included a strong sense of “beyond words.”
moderate: Your Ineffability score is moderate, suggesting the experience may have been partly hard to describe, but also partly narratable.
low: Your Ineffability score is low, suggesting the experience may have been comparatively easier to describe and put into language.
minimal: Your Ineffability score is minimal, indicating little endorsement of “beyond words” or hard-to-describe qualities on the MEQ-30.

belowThreshold: The main factor keeping the MEQ-30 complete classification from being met was {factorName}, which fell below 60%.
twoBelowThreshold: Two dimensions were below the 60% threshold—{factorA} and {factorB}—which is why the MEQ-30 complete classification is not met.
interpretiveBridge: Even when the complete criterion is not met, the pattern of scores can still describe which aspects of the experience were most pronounced.

balanced: Your scores are fairly even across dimensions, suggesting a coherent overall profile rather than one single dominant feature.
somewhatUneven: Your scores show some unevenness, suggesting certain dimensions were more central than others.
uneven: Your scores are clearly selective: some dimensions were strong while others were comparatively muted. This can be useful for describing how the experience was profound, even if it is not “complete” by convention.

generic: If you wrote notes about your experience, try rereading them alongside these subscale patterns—often the most helpful insight comes from matching the numbers to your own language and imagery.

mystical: Reflection prompt: Were there moments that felt deeply true, sacred, or unified—even briefly?
positiveMood: Reflection prompt: What emotional tone stands out most (uplift, peace, neutrality, fear, complexity)?
timeSpace: Reflection prompt: Did time or place feel altered, expanded, paused, or irrelevant at any point?
ineffability: Reflection prompt: What parts feel hardest to describe—and what metaphors come closest?

factorDisplayNames.mystical: Sense of Unity, Noetic Quality, and Sacredness

meetsThresholdShort.mystical: Your Sense of Unity, Noetic Quality, and Sacredness score meets the ≥60% threshold.
meetsThresholdShort.positiveMood: Your Positive Mood score meets the ≥60% threshold.
meetsThresholdShort.timeSpace: Your Transcendence of Time/Space score meets the ≥60% threshold.
meetsThresholdShort.ineffability: Your Ineffability score meets the ≥60% threshold.

notes: This pattern often reflects a strongly meaningful experience that lacks one conventional component needed for the 'complete' classification.
This profile suggests clear strengths in some dimensions alongside other dimensions that were not strongly endorsed.

customNotes: Notably, the experience appears strong in mystical qualities while showing low positive mood. This may reflect an experience that felt profound or significant without feeling primarily pleasant.
Your pattern suggests a profound shift in meaning and in time/space perception, while the experience remained comparatively describable in words.

Several dimensions were extremely strong, with one dimension present at a moderate level—this often reads as a powerful experience with a specific 'missing ingredient' relative to the complete profile.
Your scores suggest a broadly meaningful experience with multiple dimensions present, but none reaching the high range used for the complete MEQ-30 convention.
Your scores suggest that the experience, as recalled and rated here, contained relatively few of the features emphasized in the MEQ-30 mystical-type framework.
Your pattern is mixed. The notes below describe which dimensions were strongest and which were less emphasized, using the MEQ-30 framework.

complete: نتایج شما با معیار پژوهشی MEQ-30 برای یک تجربهٔ عرفانیِ کامل هم‌خوان است: امتیاز ۶۰٪ یا بالاتر در هر چهار خرده‌مقیاس (احساس یگانگی، کیفیتِ دانایی، و قداست؛ حالت مثبت؛ فرارَوی از زمان/فضا؛ و ناگفتنی).
notComplete: نتایج شما با معیار پژوهشی MEQ-30 برای یک تجربهٔ عرفانیِ کامل هم‌خوان نیست (۶۰٪ یا بالاتر در هر چهار خرده‌مقیاس: احساس یگانگی، کیفیتِ دانایی، و قداست؛ حالت مثبت؛ فرارَوی از زمان/فضا؛ و ناگفتنی). این به معنای بی‌معنا بودن تجربه نیست—فقط یعنی با الگوی کاملِ MEQ-30 برای آن طبقه‌بندی خاص منطبق نیست.

veryHigh: امتیاز «احساس یگانگی، کیفیتِ دانایی، و قداست» شما بسیار بالا است و نشان می‌دهد ویژگی‌هایی مانند یگانگی، قداست، و حسِ حقیقتِ عمیق یا بینش در تجربه پررنگ بوده‌اند.
high: امتیاز «احساس یگانگی، کیفیتِ دانایی، و قداست» شما بالا است و نشان می‌دهد ویژگی‌هایی مانند یگانگی/قداست و حسِ مواجهه با چیزی عمیقاً واقعی یا مهم وجود داشته است.
moderate: امتیاز «احساس یگانگی، کیفیتِ دانایی، و قداست» شما متوسط است و نشان می‌دهد برخی ویژگی‌های عرفانی حضور داشته‌اند، حتی اگر در سراسر تجربه غالب نبوده باشند.
low: امتیاز «احساس یگانگی، کیفیتِ دانایی، و قداست» شما پایین است؛ یعنی تجربه احتمالاً ویژگی‌های هسته‌ای عرفانی (مانند یگانگی/قداست/کیفیتِ دانایی) را کمتر نشان داده است.
minimal: امتیاز «احساس یگانگی، کیفیتِ دانایی، و قداست» شما بسیار کم است و نشان می‌دهد ویژگی‌های هسته‌ای عرفانی در چارچوب MEQ-30 کمتر تأیید شده‌اند.

veryHigh: امتیاز «حالت مثبت» شما بسیار بالا است و احساس‌هایی مانند شادی، آرامش، عشق، قدردانی، یا تعالی هیجانیِ عمیق را بازتاب می‌دهد.
high: امتیاز «حالت مثبت» شما بالا است و نشان می‌دهد تجربه شامل ارتقای هیجانی و عاطفهٔ مثبت قابل‌توجه بوده است.
moderate: امتیاز «حالت مثبت» شما متوسط است و نشان می‌دهد لحن هیجانی تا حدی مثبت بوده، هرچند ممکن است ترکیبی، خنثی، یا متغیر بوده باشد.
low: امتیاز «حالت مثبت» شما پایین است؛ یعنی تجربه عمدتاً با عاطفهٔ مثبت تعریف نشده—or ممکن است پیچیده، خنثی، یا چالش‌برانگیز بوده باشد.
minimal: امتیاز «حالت مثبت» شما بسیار کم است و نشان می‌دهد آیتم‌های عاطفهٔ مثبت در MEQ-30 کمتر تأیید شده‌اند.

veryHigh: امتیاز «فرارَوی از زمان/فضا» شما بسیار بالا است و نشان می‌دهد تجربهٔ تغییرات شدید در ادراک زمان، مکان، یا پرسپکتیو شخصی (مثلاً بی‌زمانی یا بی‌مکانی) وجود داشته است.
high: امتیاز «فرارَوی از زمان/فضا» شما بالا است و نشان می‌دهد تغییرات قابل‌توجهی در تجربهٔ زمان و مکان رخ داده است.
moderate: امتیاز «فرارَوی از زمان/فضا» شما متوسط است و نشان می‌دهد تا حدی از ادراک معمول زمان/فضا فاصله گرفته‌اید، اما نه به‌طور پیوسته یا شدید.
low: امتیاز «فرارَوی از زمان/فضا» شما پایین است و نشان می‌دهد تجربه بیشتر به ادراک معمول زمان و مکان نزدیک بوده است.
minimal: امتیاز «فرارَوی از زمان/فضا» شما بسیار کم است و نشان می‌دهد آیتم‌های تغییر زمان/فضا در MEQ-30 کمتر تأیید شده‌اند.

veryHigh: امتیاز «ناگفتنی» شما بسیار بالا است و نشان می‌دهد تجربه به‌طور ویژه سخت‌بیان و فراتر از زبان معمول بوده است.
high: امتیاز «ناگفتنی» شما بالا است و نشان می‌دهد تجربه حسِ «فراتر از واژه‌ها» داشته است.
moderate: امتیاز «ناگفتنی» شما متوسط است و نشان می‌دهد تجربه تا حدی سخت‌بیان بوده، اما تا حدی نیز قابل روایت بوده است.
low: امتیاز «ناگفتنی» شما پایین است و نشان می‌دهد تجربه نسبتاً آسان‌تر قابل بیان و روایت بوده است.
minimal: امتیاز «ناگفتنی» شما بسیار کم است و نشان می‌دهد ویژگی‌های سخت‌بیان یا فراتر از زبان در MEQ-30 کمتر تأیید شده‌اند.

factorDisplayNames.mystical: احساس یگانگی، کیفیتِ دانایی، و قداست

meetsThresholdShort.mystical: امتیاز «احساس یگانگی، کیفیتِ دانایی، و قداست» شما به آستانهٔ ۶۰٪ می‌رسد.
meetsThresholdShort.positiveMood: امتیاز «حالت مثبت» شما به آستانهٔ ۶۰٪ می‌رسد.
meetsThresholdShort.timeSpace: امتیاز «فرارَوی از زمان/فضا» شما به آستانهٔ ۶۰٪ می‌رسد.

recommendedApproach: Compute factor proportions (0..1), assign each factor a band, compute completeMystical, nearMissCount, topFactors, bottomFactor, balanceBand.
Pick best combo rule by highest priority that matches; apply verdict and any custom notes.
Assemble narrative blocks in the engine's assemblyOrder.
For strengths: include factorMeanings for top 1–2 factors (prefer High/VeryHigh first, else Moderate).
For limiting: include limiting phrase(s) for up to 1–2 factors below 0.6, then include those factors' factorMeanings at their bands.
Add balance note, then closing + optional reflection prompts for lowest factor (and maybe top factor).
safety: Avoid diagnosing or claiming therapeutic outcomes.
Always say 'by MEQ-30 convention' when using the complete mystical label.
